description: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has targeted various collaboration tools like Slack, Teams, JIRA, Confluence, and others to hunt for exposed credentials to support privilege escalation and lateral movement.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)

external_references.description: MSTIC, DART, M365 Defender. (2022, March 24). DEV-0537 Criminal Actor Targeting Organizations for Data Exfiltration and Destruction. Retrieved May 17, 2022.
